column2: The social network about books allowing everyone to share the books they love or their own products"Facebook Integration
You can now integrate social sign-in and sharing with sites such as Facebook, Twitter, Google, and LinkedIn using Janrain. You can import members from the Facebook and Twitter integration here.

column1: Linking your Facebook account will let you login with Facebook and publish content to your Facebook wall.
column2: Liên kết với tài khoản Facebook của bạn sẽ cho phép bạn đăng nhập với Facebook và đăng nội dung lên tường.
